# [Interview #1138: Shadows of Self-Beaverton, OR, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1138#1)

#### WayneSpren

"Why did Wayne choose to ride with Hoid on the exterior of the carriage in SoS?"

#### Brandon Sanderson

"Wayne likes Hoid, but he doesn't know who he is."
